product_overview: Escola Habilidade is an educational platform dedicated to delivering technology-focused courses such as programming, design, marketing, and office skills. It targets students and professionals primarily in the Florianópolis, São José, and Palhoça regions, with a strong emphasis on usability, responsive design, and optimized lead generation to boost enrollment and engagement.
core_goals: Provide detailed and engaging course landing pages that highlight curriculum, testimonials, pricing, and clear CTAs to drive enrollment.
Implement multiple robust contact forms integrated with EmailJS, complemented by WhatsApp fallback options to maximize lead generation.
Deliver a fully responsive experience optimized for both desktop and mobile devices to cater to the broad target audience.
Enhance user engagement through a well-structured blog system featuring dynamic content, SEO best practices, and user interactivity.
Optimize site performance via techniques like image optimization, lazy loading, and mobile-specific enhancements to ensure fast page loads and smooth interactions.
Leverage SEO components including meta tags, structured data, and social sharing features to improve discoverability and organic traffic.
key_features: Comprehensive Course Pages: Dedicated landing pages for various courses such as Projetista 3D and Informática Nova featuring detailed curriculum, testimonials, video galleries, pricing, and transformation promises.
Multiple Contact Forms: Embedded contact forms utilizing EmailJS with WhatsApp integration as fallback to capture leads effectively.
Blog System: A dynamic blog platform with SEO optimization, advanced search, category filters, share buttons, and inline calls to action to engage and retain users.
WhatsApp Integration: Multiple contact points through floating buttons and smart CTAs enhancing real-time communication potential.
Responsive Navigation: Mega menu system optimized for desktop and mobile, including interactive logo and fluid navigation experience.
Hero Sections: Conversion-focused landing page heroes with animated backgrounds and engaging content to attract user attention.
Performance Optimization: Use of lazy loading, optimized images, and mobile performance enhancements to ensure excellent user experience across devices.
SEO Components: Implementation of SEOHead, breadcrumbs, and structured data to enhance search engine rankings and social sharing.
user_flow_summary: Users land on the main page greeted by an animated hero section designed to capture interest and guide them towards courses or blog content.
Navigating via a responsive mega menu, users can easily explore course listings or access blog posts filtered by categories or search results.
Users interested in courses can visit detailed course pages that provide curriculum, testimonials, investment information, and multiple CTAs including enrollment options.
From various pages, users can submit inquiries through contact forms that use EmailJS integration or opt to send messages via WhatsApp fallback mechanisms.
Blog visitors can read articles, use advanced search and filters to find relevant content, and share posts via social media using integrated share buttons.
Throughout the site, users experience fast load times and mobile-optimized interfaces, thanks to performance and SEO optimizations integrated throughout the platform.
validation_criteria: Course pages display complete and accurate information including curriculum, pricing, testimonials, and video galleries where applicable.
All contact forms successfully send messages through EmailJS and fallback to WhatsApp if EmailJS is unavailable.
Blog system supports dynamic content loading with functional search, category filters, and share buttons working correctly.
Responsive design functions seamlessly across popular devices and browsers, including navigation menus and interactive elements.
Performance optimization techniques such as lazy loading and image optimization measurably improve page load times on mobile and desktop.
SEO meta tags, structured data, and social sharing components are correctly implemented and verified via standard SEO auditing tools.
WhatsApp integration buttons and smart CTAs are visible, accessible and trigger the appropriate messaging interface when activated.
